title: Social Media Marketing Expert
job_overview:
We are seeking an experienced social media marketer to promote and sell our products on social media in the US marketplace. The position offers weekly pay through PayPal and is a long-term opportunity.

The ideal candidate must be an expert in social media marketing and possess a strong track record of success. We are not currently seeking beginners for this role.

Please apply through the following google form link (we won’t check your onlinejobs message) Upgrade to see actual info
